elements.text: Are you currently receiving any help for issues related to mental health? Please select all that apply, or "I am not receiving help".

buttons:
Therapy::Therapy (talking with a trained professional)

Examples: Psychologist, licensed mental health practitioner (LMHC), school counselor, social worker, marriage and family therapist, group therapist

Prescription:: Prescription medications

Examples: Psychiatrist, medical doctor

Social::Seeking other social support (talking with non-professionals)

Examples: Teacher, family member, friend, religious leader, coach

SelfHelp::Self-guided help

Examples: Self-help book, blogs, online intervention (other than MindTrails-Movement), mobile applications
elements.name: help
